title: Make golden Malzahar chroma spells/spell shield golden!
body:
Malzahar has long been confined to the color of purple spells matching the void he is a prophet of, but i really feel with a unique golden chroma even for christmas that a golden spell effect would be a well deserved change for him. With 500k+ masteries you may have guessed I love malzahar with passion! Of course I have all his skins. While the skins themselves have color and variety, his spells... all reflect the same color save for the winter one. With that in mind i feel an additional effect of the golden color would be an impactful change that would increase the desirability of the chroma. Even if you only changed the color of his spell shield to a golden tint, it would be a dramatic increase for the skin's overall appeal. Thank you for your time and consideration. 

Kind regards,
Thorgarr

replies.body:
They would lose sales on Shadow Prince Malzahar then

###### Just a joke. no kill please
